scripts.test-coveralls: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports test/index.js
scripts.test-travis: npm run test-cli && npm run test-browser && npm run test-coveralls
scripts.test: npm run test-lib && npm run test-browser && npm run test-cli
scripts.lint-style: node_modules/.bin/jscs index.js lib/franc.js cli.js script/build-fixtures.js script/build-support.js script/build-languages.js benchmark.js test/index.js test/browser.js --reporter=inline
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-cli && npm run lint-script && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-benchmark && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.build-browser-bundle-top: THRESHOLD=8000000 npm run build-languages && node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/franc.js --standalone franc --outfile dist/franc.js
scripts.build-browser-bundle-most: npm run build-languages && node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/franc.js --standalone franc --outfile dist/franc-most.js
scripts.build-browser-bundle-all: THRESHOLD=-1 npm run build-languages && node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/franc.js --standalone franc --outfile dist/franc-all.js
scripts.build-browser-bundle: npm run build-browser-bundle-top && npm run build-browser-bundle-all && npm run build-browser-bundle-most
scripts.build-browser-uglify: npm run build-browser-uglify-top && npm run build-browser-uglify-most && npm run build-browser-uglify-all
scripts.build-browser: npm run build-browser-bundle && npm run build-browser-uglify
scripts.build: npm run build-browser && npm run build-fixtures && npm run build-support
